data.name: Camps_Line_001
data.value: When trailblazers first came to climb the mountain,[pause=0] they set up rest camps along the way.[br]Go straight through the {0} they left behind, and you'll find yourself in {1}.

data.name: Carry_Line_001
data.value: Gah![pause=0] Why'd Snorlax choose to take a nap in front of our storehouse of all places?

data.name: Carry_Line_002
data.value: I'd give him a wake-up call and a piece of my mind,[pause=0] but I'm still recovering from last time...

data.name: Carry_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](carry) I'm on my routine route in forest camp!

data.name: Catch_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]We're playing catch in the woods!

data.name: Catch_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]And sunkern might humorously comment from the side, wanting join but has no arms!

data.name: Child_Secret_Ask
data.value: Want me to show you?

data.name: Child_Secret_Ask_Again
data.value: Want me to show you the secret path?

data.name: Child_Secret_Checkpoint_001
data.value: Okay,[pause=30] so you start by squeezing in right here...

data.name: Child_Secret_Checkpoint_002
data.value: And keep going East.

data.name: Child_Secret_Checkpoint_003
data.value: And then you go South...

data.name: Child_Secret_Checkpoint_004
data.value: Then West...

data.name: Child_Secret_Checkpoint_005
data.value: Then North...

data.name: Child_Secret_Checkpoint_006
data.value: And finally, East!

data.name: Child_Secret_Complete_001
data.value: Ta-da! The {0}!

data.name: Child_Secret_Complete_002
data.value: Do you like it?[pause=0] A white, flowery Pokémon showed me this while we were playing!

data.name: Child_Secret_Line_001
data.value: It's my heroes![br]Guess what?[pause=30] A new friend took me to a secret playground!

data.name: Child_Secret_Mistake_001
data.value: Oops![pause=30] That's not right![br]If you take a wrong turn, you'll have to start over from the clearing...

data.name: Cure_After_Line_001
data.value: {0}, this is {1}![pause=0] They're the ones that saved you from that sickness!

data.name: Cure_After_Line_002
data.value: Thanks you lots for helping me get better![pause=0] You're my heroes!

data.name: Cure_Done_Line_001
data.value: No worries now, {0} will soon recover from sickness.

data.name: Cure_Done_Line_002
data.value: I don't know what I would've done without your help.

data.name: Cure_Line_001
data.value: The {0}![pause=0] Thank goodness![br]I'll make the medicine right away!

data.name: Cure_Line_002
data.value: There.[pause=0] {0} is recovering.[pause=0] He should be back to normal in a day.

data.name: Cure_Line_003
data.value: {0},[pause=30] We can't thank you enough for your bravery.[pause=0] Please, take this.

data.name: Deliver_Line_001
data.value: The supplies for Cliff Camp are running late.[pause=0] Swalot will have our heads for this!

data.name: Deliver_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](deliver) I'm on my routine route in forest camp!

data.name: Doduo_Line_001
data.value: We're Team Tactical Retreat![pause=0]\nOur main skill is outrunning our opponents!

data.name: Doduo_Line_002
data.value: In Mystery Dungeons, it might be tempting to fight everything you see...[scroll] but that's not always a good idea.

data.name: Doduo_Line_003
data.value: Some wild Pokémon can be brutal.[pause=0]\nLearning when to run is important for surviving.

data.name: Elder_Complete_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]That scarf...[br]It's a keepsake of my partner who disappeared after crossing the bandits.[br]Here, you can have this. I can finally let it go.

data.name: Elder_Complete_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for putting the outlaws out of business.

data.name: Elder_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]A moment of your time. Would you be able to look for something in Ambush Forest?[br]A scarf...

data.name: Elder_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]If you see a scarf like this in Ambush Forest... please bring it back to me.

data.name: Pachirisu_Line_001
data.value: Hiya![pause=0] Great to see new people around![br]Are you going up ahead?[pause=0] You'd better pack yourself one of these.

data.name: Pachirisu_Line_002
data.value: You should always bring [a/an] {0} when exploring a new dungeon.[scroll]Until you clear it for the first time,[pause=30] you don't know how deep it goes[pause=30] or how dangerous it'll get.

data.name: Pachirisu_Line_003
data.value: Especially if the dungeon resets your level...

data.name: Parent_Child_Line_001
data.value: Mama, I wanna go out and play!

data.name: Parent_Child_Line_002
data.value: Alright dearie,[pause=30] but you musn't leave the clearing.[br]You're still just a seedling, and there's big scary Mystery Dungeons out there.

data.name: Parent_Line_001
data.value: My little seedling has grown so healthy!

data.name: Sickness_Line_001
data.value: Please, tell me.[pause=0] Is {0} going to be okay?

data.name: Sickness_Line_002
data.value: It's not looking good.[pause=0] The usual treatments aren't working.[br]This is more serious than I thought.[br]An illness like this could only be the work of the {0}.

data.name: Sickness_Line_004
data.value: It's rumored that a rare and malicious pox originates from there.[br]One that only infects the healthiest children.[br]The only cure is a rare plant that endures in the depths of the dungeon.

data.name: Sickness_Line_005
data.value: You must take me there! I have to save my seedling!

data.name: Sickness_Line_006
data.value: No![pause=30] It's too dangerous![pause=0] You'd wither to the poison in an instant!

data.name: Sickness_Line_007
data.value: {0}...[br]I know this is a lot to ask,[pause=30] but will you help us?

data.name: Sickness_Line_007_Skilled
data.value: {0},[pause=30] you're accomplished explorers.[pause=0] Will you help us?

data.name: Sickness_Line_008
data.value: If you can find the herb that grows in the deep part of {0},[scroll]I can make a medicine to cure {1}.

data.name: Parent_Sickness_Line_001
data.value: Please, you have to help my child...

data.name: Camps_Sickness_Line_001
data.value: You will need to extract the herb from around {0}F.[br]But be warned...[scroll]{1} is a miserable place,[pause=30] said to be the source of all plagues.[br]You should prepare before you enter.

data.name: Sleeper_Line_001
data.value: Snorlax is asleep,[pause=30] inconveniently blocking the entrance...

data.name: Sleeper_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]GROOOOO!

data.name: Sleeper_Line_Ask
data.value: Wake it up?

data.name: Sleeper_Line_Fail_001
data.value: [tmp]Yeah, he doesn't like having his sleep disturbed.

data.name: Sleeper_Line_Success_001
data.value: [tmp]NOOOOO *Runs away*

data.name: Sleeper_Line_Success_002
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for moving Snorlax. Have a reward.

data.name: Sleeper_Line_Success_003
data.value: [tmp]Lets get this stock to cliff camp.

data.name: Solo_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I don't need teammates, I can get through myself!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp]I'm on my routine route in forest camp!

data.name: Unlucky_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Which way do I go?[br]Through my dialogue I establish I'm really bad with directions.[br]Chimecho told me to go straight down Faded Trail but I kept taking alternate exits and never unlocked Cliff Camp.
